variable-sql.name: DocumentSearchQuery
variable-sql.query: SELECT DISTINCT top 5000 im.ImageName,acct.IndexCValue,dc.DocumentDate,dt.DocumentType, pv.PatientVisitID, ip.PageNumber, im.MasterKey, ip.PageKey FROM dbo.ImageMaster im INNER JOIN dbo.ImagePage ip ON im.MasterKey = IP.MasterDocument INNER JOIN dbo.tblDisplayColumns dc ON dc.DocumentKey = ip.PageKey AND dc.SourceLoadNumber = im.MasterKey INNER JOIN dbo.tblDocumentTypes dt ON dt.DocumentTypeID = dc.DocumentTypeID INNER JOIN dbo.vwDIS_AccountNBR acct ON acct.DisplayID = dc.DisplayID INNER JOIN dbo.tblPatientVisits pv ON pv.PatientVisitAccount = acct.IndexCValue INNER JOIN dbo.tbldocumentsource ds ON ds.SourceID = dt.SourceID where ds.SourceDescription in ('PDF Data') and dt.DocumentType = 'Demand'
